name: Who has used and how?
description: Consumers of the value set and the implementations, projects or standards that the author has utilized the value set in.

element.formal: Consumers of the value set and the implementations, projects or standards that the author has utilized the value set in.
element.comments: This is likely to be a ???point in time??? view and should not be considered an authoritative listing of all uses of the value set.

element.short: A consumer of or client for the value set
element.formal: This is most likely to be an organization but can be an individual. It would not be a program, that information should be recorded in the usage.use.
A descriptive name of the project or standard in which the value set is used.
